Collections.Name: Whip
Collections.Explain: They attack the enemy from side to side.

Collections.Name: Bloody Tear
Collections.Explain: The evolutionary form of a whip. Deal critical damage and absorb HP.

Collections.Name: Magic Wand
Collections.Explain: Attack the nearest enemy.

Collections.Name: Holy Wand
Collections.Explain: The evolution of the magic wand. The size of the weapon increases.

Collections.Name: Knife
Collections.Explain: Throw a dagger in the direction you're looking at

Collections.Name: Thousand Edge
Collections.Explain: The evolution of daggers. The size of the weapon increases.

Collections.Name: Cross
Collections.Explain: It flies to the nearest enemy and comes back like a boomerang.

Collections.Name: Heaven Spear
Collections.Explain: The evolutionary form of the cross. It will cause fatal damage.

Collections.Name: KingBible
Collections.Explain: Spin around and attack.

Collections.Name: Holy Vespers
Collections.Explain: The evolution of the Bible. It doesn't disappear.

Collections.Name: Fire Wand
Collections.Explain: It fires in random directions and causes great damage.

Collections.Name: Hell Fire
Collections.Explain: The evolution of the wand of fire. It penetrates the enemy.

Collections.Name: Garlic
Collections.Explain: Damage enemies within range. Reduce enemy knockback, ice resistance.

Collections.Name: Soul Eater
Collections.Explain: An evolutionary form of garlic. It absorbs physical strength when dealing with enemies and increases damage when absorbing physical strength.

Collections.Name: Peachone
Collections.Explain: Bombard the area of the circle.

Collections.Name: Ebony Wings
Collections.Explain: Bombard the area of the circle.

Collections.Name: Vandalier
Collections.Explain: Evolution of white and black pigeons.

Collections.Name: LightningRing
Collections.Explain: Lightning strikes random enemies.

Collections.Name: Thunder Loop
Collections.Explain: Evolution of Lightning Ring. Projectile strikes twice.

Collections.Name: Spinach
Collections.Explain: Attack increases by 10%

Collections.Name: Armor
Collections.Explain: Defensive 1, counterattack damage increased by 10%.

Collections.Name: Hollow Heart
Collections.Explain: Maximum fitness increases by 20%

Collections.Name: Pummarola
Collections.Explain: You recover 0.2 of your stamina every second.

Collections.Name: Empty Tome
Collections.Explain: Cool time is reduced by 8 per cent.

Collections.Name: Candelabrador
Collections.Explain: Attack range increased by 10%.

Collections.Name: Bracer
Collections.Explain: Projectile speed increases by 10%.

Collections.Name: Duplicator
Collections.Explain: The number of projectiles is increased by one.

Collections.Name: Spell binder
Collections.Explain: Duration increases by 10%.

Collections.Name: Wings
Collections.Explain: Moving speed increases by 10%.

Collections.Name: Attractorb
Collections.Explain: Item acquisition range increases.

Collections.Name: Clover
Collections.Explain: Luck increases by 10 per cent.

Collections.Name: Crwon
Collections.Explain: Experience acquisition increases by 8 per cent.

Collections.Name: StoneMask
Collections.Explain: Gold acquisition increases by 10%.

Collections.Name: Skull
Collections.Explain: Curses (enemy speed, fitness, quantity, frequency) increase by 10%.

Collections.Name: Expience
Collections.Explain: Increase experience.

Collections.Name: Gold
Collections.Explain: Gold on acquisition.

Collections.Name: Heart
Collections.Explain: Recover 30 physical strength.

Collections.Name: Chest
Collections.Explain: Gold and random power up. You can only get it from a powerful enemy.

Collections.Name: The tragedy of a princess
Collections.Explain: achieved Necromancer level 99

Collections.Name: The Will of Blue Steel
Collections.Explain: achieved Barbarian level 99

Collections.Name: Gress Land
Collections.Explain: 31 min survival in the Gress Land

Collections.Name: A divine lineage
Collections.Explain: achieved Alchemist level 99

Collections.Name: The root
Collections.Explain: achieved Rogue level 99

Collections.Name: The Waltz of Pearl
Collections.Explain: achieved StormMage level 99

Collections.Name: The heart of fire
Collections.Explain: achieved FireMage level 99

Collections.Name: Blood Astronomy
Collections.Explain: achieved Warlock level 99
